text: niccayamāka nāmē uṅkaḷaip paṭaittōm; piṉpu uṅkaḷukku urukkoṭuttōm. Ataṉpiṉ, "ātamukku sujutu ceyyuṅkaḷ (ciram paṇiyuṅkaḷ)" eṉṟu malakkukaḷiṭam kūṟiṉōm; iplīsait tavira (maṟṟa malakkukaḷ) yāvarum (avarukkut) talaivaṇakkam ceytārkaḷ; avaṉ (maṭṭum) talaivaṇakkam ceytavarkaḷil oruvaṉāka irukkavillai
